job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrTechnical Lead to design and build integration microservices for SalesforcenCino platform manage an agile mindset self directed engineering scrum team to build the best in class commercial loan origination platform Should be able to partner with product owners and solve complex requirements and design system to scale and size related to commercial lending across multiple product lines Partnering with other technical leads product owners and front line business experts Be able to look around the bend problem solve and work with competing prioritiesbrbrRWF  Please note that RWF is an identifier for internal recruiting purposes only and has no connection to the nature or responsibilities of the jobbrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli5 years of Java
